text:
Thank youu ;w;
Sometimes I need to just draw the tender moments
X-men fanart. Gambit. I still get push notifs from the bird site and got tagged because “badonkadonk hussy gambit” is someone’s lock screen and that seems like a good enough reason to repost this 😂

BG3 fanart. Wyll. 🎨 ...guess I'll just hyperfocus and finish this in one sitting. I ended up doing more color than I expected, but I like it.

Wyll is maybe my favorite from a fannish standpoint? I just can't stop thinking about one of his endings.

Two elves under the pale moonlight 🌙✨
#BaldursGate3 #BG3 #Astarion #Halsin #Halstarion
ohhhh ok that makes sense

Wha?? D:
Personal hashtag? What you mean?
lmao he was safe behind all that fur but now he better think fast xD

Halsin lost track of how long he was in bear form. Get ready to runnn 🐝
#BaldursGate3 #BG3 #Halsin
HALLO FRIEND 👁️
Hehehe There's a special something about beefy elves -w-

My Durge, Velkaen! A big beefy Drow Barbarian with an undeniable bloodlust
#BG3 #BaldursGate3 #durge

smug shit
#WIP #Astarion

I'm always late to the trend party, but here's my contribution!
#Astarion #BG3 #BaldursGate3
halsin thinking if he should shave, after morning bath.

sorry, been more active on twitter. I was considering getting the bsky app, but from what little i've read it seems not the greatest atm. (I mean i know this is all new so i'm not upset about it. Atm, i use browser and it's easier to fall out of the habit of checking
His skin was paler but upping the contrast made him more peachy. Idc tho I'm too lazy to work more on it sgdhdk

I was just about to comment this haha
Like... everyone's got opinions but damn.
It IS!! I wish I could put him in this in game x) thank you!

Saw this outfit and just knew i had to draw him in it x) 
#BG3 #BaldursGate3 #Astarion
Thank you!! I struggled to get it exactly like how it is in game, but it's close enough x)
omg thank you! I feel like i lean on the soft side so that's nice feedback to get!

My (current) Tav! His name is Carlius. A feytouched Tiefling Bard who is deeply in love with Gale
#BG3 #BaldursGate3 #tav
I revived my dormant Tumblr account! If anyone on here also browses Tumblr, you can find me there at the same username :D
Ohhh I am a newbie to One Piece and have only seen the netflix live action series. He is super hot tho. Really livens up the Oldman fucker in me :))
a couple of Rayleigh that i did for old-ish zine projects
IDK WHO THAT IS BUT HE PRETTY
btw y'all, my hornee alt is @@1951 :)
AHHH NOO NOT YOUR BREAKFAST!! THANK YOU SO MUCH FRIEND!!!
all this for a child who isn't even here

The forehead kiss seen round the world. I'm ever so grateful to Larian for opening my eyes to this glorious ship. Happy Valentines Day y'all!
#BG3 #Halstarion #Astarion #Halsin
/ᐠ｡ꞈ｡ᐟ\

Morning sketch of dear Astarion 
#BG3 #BaldursGate3

*opens up about feelings *

*quickly deletes*
Old Måneskin fanarts that i did.
These are all so pretty!
Hm I never rly considered art streaming... i see ppl advertising theirs on here often. Hmmmmm 🤔
owo
I need someone to be the Halsin to my Astarion. Gimme all the forehead kisses

I made a cheat sheet for the Art Feeds hashtags because I don't even remember them all yet. 😅 You can get any post into a feed by adding tags in a reply. Good for when you forgot to tag or want to give someone else a boost! #art
Yeah I had an edgy but "quirky" teen phase. I've made different iterations of Adrian, but this is the first design of him I did. I even wanted to make a story with him but it fell flat

Prematurely woke up pretty upset because of bs going on with my job. Decided to vent it out with a sketch and at the last minute I decided to make this into another old OC. This time it's a dhampir (half vampire) named Adrian. Hates people, but loves coffee and his pet turtle.
Thank you!! I'm fully on board with this ship now I absolutely couldn't sleep until I got this out of my system haha 💖

i wish i could have sketched this a tad more gracefully but i had been home all of 10 minutes before i was compelled to draw this and put flower crowns on their mf heads. Will def color this when i can

I HAD TO. CURSE YOU LARIANN
If i were to ship any two companions together, it would definitely be Halstarion #BG3
First it was the bear... now its... itss... FOREHEAD KISSES??? Mad lads indeed
LARIANNN!!1!
[ forged from starlight ☄ ]
Aww you're too kind! Thank you! I've low-key been wanting to resurrect my old OCs so it was nice to do this little something
(But seriously I know where you're coming from.  I'm constantly wanting to do different arts at once)
Roll a 4 sided die Lol
Hehe thank you! I'm liking where it's at so far in the process but I feel I'm about to run into some walls now that I've breached my comfort zone.
sadge
You've ticked far too many boxes with one sentence
Hah...
Oh yeah of course! I think having people contribute would make it a lot more interesting for those very reasons. Perhaps one day once my audience grows a little more haha

Good morning sketch. This time… these are probably two of my oldest OCs. Bowen (left) and Max (right). These are obviously reinterpretations because my memory bank of them is foggy and I don’t rly have any of my old art anymore. Max in particular was like an imaginary friend when I was a kid
Second character sketch based on 4 random images submitted by twitter followers. Once again, feel free to leave any name suggestions for her! ❤️
This is a neat idea! And she came out great! I wonder if there is like an image generator for this type of exercise 🤔(mm probably)
I like never do backgrounds... methinks i'm getting a little over ambitious about this... we'll see...
oh yeah... my WIPs are definitely gonna outnumber in the ratio to finished pieces Lol
1) I approve but 2) I am very needy and need the lairs to go back to it's old model. At this rate scalpers will snag them every time

Now that you mention it, I do remember reading somewhere that you CAN go on the good path and the story you uncover on that path is worthwhile. Maybe I'll try for that idk Lol (although I also read that no matter what at least one person is bound to die at camp which is unfortunate)
I made it to act 2 and am in the shadow fell but idk.... if I do durge again I'll probs just make a new character and go full bad

I also wanted to do it on the downlow so minthara would never know, but when it came down to it I had to choose between siding with Minthara or Zevlor. Initially I sided with Minthara because I never had her as a companion but I felt guilty and reloaded the save to choose zevlor lmao

My issue with it is (despite going into it with no real plan) I wound up hoping for things to go in a way that just weren't possible. I.e. I let the captive go but told Minthara where the Grove was. I had no allegiance to the druids but I wanted to save my fellow tieflings before the attack happened
Dat cake tho

You got me tempted to like.... create a save file to return to after seeing the scene. Because yeah I started a durge run some time back and I figured that was going to be the run that I ascended Astarion with... only I never really went back to that run

I never did have him be the one to do it, but man oh man the shit eating grin on his face when he sees. That alone made me wonder why his sex scenes weren't the kinkiest (I know the mans gots trauma so I'm not rly complaining lol but he a freak)

My gripe was never necessarily with the fact that people see the sexual details and choose to lewd him.  I'm just arguing lore lol. My gripe is merely what PH has warped into with the modern public eye. Excuse my argumentative nature lol I'm just being a nerd
I see lol makes sense. I mean. You can't stop the hornee. But dammit if I see PH porn I don't wanna see ripped Bara PH from the movies. I wanna see him with his apron and gloves
Yeah... but then the devs for called out for it and begun to make cheap knock offs in future games

lol those are just the result of western devs trying to make their own pyramid head while failing to understand why pyramid head worked to begin with. All manifestations of someone's guilt and not even well executed ones

Well yeah he was a manifestation of James's sexual frustration as well as his guilt. It's been confirmed that PH is James's monster that only he can see. I don't have a problem with PH becoming iconic, but as a character and concept he is kinda ruined in the modern day
Wait when did they imply that? Pyramid Head is supposed to be tied to James. Any attempt to take it beyond that is just further muddying the waters 🫠
I will have to de-rust lmao but with this encouragement I just might :D
I am also forever a salty SH purist, but I've just accepted that things will never be the same 😔
I toggled on nsfw and oh my lordy what has happened to my good christian feed. Kinda inspiring me to draw the hornee again ngl
Breadbarian? owo
vamps

I loved PH too (I had whatever merch I could get) but I guess I never thought of him that way. And I've had my past stints as a monsterfucker so I'm not above something *like* that... but I never saw him as sexually appealing until the movie. Over time, the films and Homecoming really cheapened him

Ah I just wasn't in the areas that showed it lol. I mean I know he is linked to some nefarious sexual allegories but back then i just never saw the sexual appeal in his design. When I saw his oh-so-subtle design in the movie I didn't know what to think lmao

Now he is a meme rip
Did people lust over PH back in the day? I never saw too much objectification until they made him shirtless and ripped in the movies (and subsequent western game titles)
train sketch of an elf
Michael 🖤🖤🖤
Berserk / Griffith & Guts

Posting this separately because I love it too much. An older personal work after finishing a certain quest in Endwalker. It took me several days to calm down because I couldn't stop crying over the story 😆
Aw thank you! He is such a sweetie even in canon so I'm glad I could capture that. I'm sure he does give the best hugs ☺️
So gorge! I knew who I wanted to Sketch next after seeing this 😊

Good morning! Idk how much I'll be able to commit but I want to try to start my days with a sketch. Creatively I feel so revitalized but my job makes it hard sometimes.

Anyways here have a Halsin. My #1 tied with Astarion
#BG3

It's looking great so far! I sometimes have this fear, but maybe you can create checkpoints in a sense for yourself. Like, I'll sometimes do "merge all to new layer" so that if I screw up I can just delete the layer and try again another time.
celebrating halsin wearing the wavemother robe🐻💦
Hey folks, if you have trouble seeing videos or gifs on Bluesky, that's because the settings for it are automatically turned off. Go into your settings and go to "external media"

I never realized just how green Gale looks in this haha

I used a gradient map to try and make the sketch look a little more interesting but on the other monitor he doesn't look so green. Oh well 😆
An unearthed calamity, not fitting for reality. 🕳️
i wonder how long it will take before i give nsfw another shot as well. (probably would be on a side acct tho)
WIP! Decided to draw Gale this time! Another fav of mine and current playthrough boyfriend. Just a sketch for now #BG3
I draw Baldur’s Gate things:
Forcing myself to get the hang of this site since it's public now. Quick art dump with some pieces that I haven't posted outside of a few Discord servers🙌

Kar'niss, Twice Forsaken... 
#bg3
Lovely work! I'm totally giving this to Gale once I get to that point in current playthrough. Especially since I'm romancing him this time.
W(e)avemother’s robe 🙏

A reminder to new/returning users:

IF YOU LIKE AN ARTISTS WORK, BOOST IT!

There isn't the same kind of algorithm as on Twitter. Engagement is the ONLY way to be seen and help the artists you love.

Boosts and comments help - liking custom feeds does, too! 

Please talk to us! We LOVE comments!
#art

I need to start posting here too to get this acc going as well.

#bg3 #astarion

This paint study took years off my life but, alas, my Fairy tav cares Gale so I had to🧚
#BG3
Ofc I'm gonna drop Astarion as the first BG3 post here 🩸

To all artists who started their account with Astarion:
Solidarity 🤝
It's nice not being the old one for once

You have more strength than I. During my stint of doing commissions, I would send variations of messy sketches and maybe variations of basic colors  but these all look like near-finished paintings haha

Then again I never worked the industry so I guess expectations were lower
Thank you! I'm glad I could work through the trauma of my old stuff to make something good of it 😂

2005  vs. 2024
This was for an art meme on the bird app. Just an un-named OC from my long abandoned DA account.
*raises hand* h-hhello
Wow it's awesome to see the difference versions before the final!
Love this concept! Love Astarion~
Love the use of shape, color, and movement! I especially love unconventional use of colors
I don't think things will get explicitly nsfw in here but art will probably get suggestive from time to time. Minors should take heed.

I realize I never really introduced myself. I'm Noah! I've had my taste of fandom in the past but I took a long hiatus due to FT work taking over my life. It still kind of has, but at least I've kept up with practice.

If you do follow then be open to different things on your feed from time to time!

The timelapse is on tiktok!
www.tiktok.com/@@4387337...

More Astarion? More Astarion
Just a reinterpretation of a screenshot, but this was mostly for painty practice #BG3
I couldn't get into the show, but this is probably my favorite depiction of AD. I dig your style :D
Warming up, and starting this fresh new account, with a little Astarion sketch
